SELECT t.time AS 'time', t.contentId AS 'contentId', t.contentName AS 'contentName', t.lessionId AS 'lessionId', t.lessionName AS 'lessionName', t.oneClassify AS 'oneClassify', t.twoClassify AS 'twoClassify', count(1) AS 'collect', t.status AS 'status' FROM (SELECT date_format(f.createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') time, c.content_id contentId, c.`name` contentName, c.lesson_id lessionId, l.`name` lessionName, (SELECT c.`name` FROM train_categorys c WHERE l.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY c.category_id) AS 'oneClassify', (SELECT tc.`name` FROM train_categorys tc WHERE tc.category_id = (SELECT c.parent_id FROM train_categorys c WHERE l.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY c.category_id) ) AS 'twoClassify', CASE c.content_type WHEN 1 THEN '视频' WHEN 2 THEN '文档' WHEN 3 THEN '其他' END status FROM train_lesson_favorites f LEFT JOIN train_lesson_contents c ON c.lesson_id = f.lesson_id LEFT JOIN train_lessons l ON l.lesson_id = c.lesson_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.lesson_id IS NOT NULL
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
) AS t GROUP BY t.time,contentId
SELECT category_id AS 'categoryId', `name` AS 'oneClassify' FROM train_categorys WHERE parent_id = 0 ORDER BY category_id
SELECT c.category_id AS 'categoryId', c.`name` AS 'twoClassify' FROM train_categorys c WHERE c.category_id = (SELECT tc.parent_id FROM train_categorys tc WHERE tc.category_id = #{categoryId} )
